channel.title: What To Add To A PK Server?
channel.description:
Soo On My Hybrid PvP Source This Is What I've Done:
Fixed All Dupes Donor Shop Better Shops Fixed Fast Prayer Draining Made Switching 200% Faster Added 100% Korasi Fixed All Wilderness Spawn Tricks ETC. Better Teleports Quest Tab Shows PK and Donator Points Dicing Made Website Donations Page Forums And Some Other Things I Can't Remember.
What Else To Add To Make It Good? Help Me Out Here.

item.title: What To Add To A PK Server?
item.dc:creator: @MacaYork MacaYork
item.description:
@MacaYork wrote:

when you put it up on (i dont know why but it changes it to google automatically) R U N E L O C U S it puts you to the homepage until 5 more servers are posted which pushes you off.

I find the best time to put it up is around 6pm uk time as you should get around 5-10 new players on average from it when you put it up.

Read full topic
item.source: What To Add To A PK Server?

item.title: What To Add To A PK Server?
item.dc:creator: @Turmoilz1337x Turmoilz1337x
item.description:
@Turmoilz1337x wrote:

How Do I Get The Server Started? I Have Players Who Like It, But They Normally Log Off Cause There’s Nobody On To PK With. I’ve Tried PlayerShare, Mopar-Status, and Rs-Ps Status. What Else Can I Do?

Read full topic
item.source: What To Add To A PK Server?

item.title: What To Add To A PK Server?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Turmoilz1337x:

Yeah Fixed. But Theres No Ditch So Theres Nothing Stopping Them From Running Safe Except A 10 Second Timer.

The 10 second timer is better than the ditch.

Read full topic
item.source: What To Add To A PK Server?

item.title: What To Add To A PK Server?
item.dc:creator: @MacaYork MacaYork
item.description:
@MacaYork wrote:

running is not a massive problem you can just ice barrage/bolas

its teleing thats the annoying part

Read full topic

item.title: What To Add To A PK Server?
item.dc:creator: @MacaYork MacaYork
item.description:
@MacaYork wrote:

have you made it so people can’t tele out of wilderness?

That really annoys me on some servers when they tele out of fight to keep items if they’re losing.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“Turmoilz1337x, post:1, topic:458058”]Soo On My Hybrid PvP Source This Is What I’ve Done:

Fixed All Dupes
Donor Shop
Better Shops
Fixed Fast Prayer Draining
Made Switching 200% Faster
Added 100% Korasi
Fixed All Wilderness Spawn Tricks ETC.
Better Teleports
Quest Tab Shows PK and Donator Points
Dicing
Made Website
Donations Page
Forums
And Some Other Things I Can’t Remember.

What Else To Add To Make It Good? Help Me Out Here.[/quote]

Bet i could login and do a dupe right now you guys dont know about, it’s still do-able on most up to date servers.
